title: Clear noon, moderate-speed city driving with a red car in the distance.
caption: A red car drives down a city street with other cars parked on the side.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNoon). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.2 m/s). There are 24 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is a one-way street with a speed limit of 30 mph. The traffic is moderate with a few cars driving in the opposite direction. The weather is clear and sunny. There are several traffic lights and street signs along the road.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed and following the red car in the distance. It slows down when approaching a traffic light and stops when the light turns red. The ego vehicle changes lanes to overtake a parked truck and then changes back to the original lane. It maintains a safe distance from other vehicles on the road.
